channel.title: libots-dev does not double as anti-stylometry tool
channel.description:
Answering my own question based on experiments: No it does not change text style but it reduces paragraph numbers in response to summarizing ratio.
https://www.whonix.org/pipermail/whonix-devel/2018-August/001214.html
